message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. What do you think?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand your concerns about the price, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $11000. This is the lowest I can go, considering the product's value to me. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $11000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $9500 for the product. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9500. I'm willing to make another concession and offer $10800. This is the lowest I can go without losing money on the deal. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but $10800 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $9200 for the product. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer $10500. This is as low as I can go. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options. What do you think?

I understand that you're getting close to your minimum price, but I'm still not willing to pay $10500. I'm willing to meet you at $9800, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. I'm starting to think about other options, including buying from John for $15000.

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9800. I'm willing to make one final concession and offer $10200. This is my absolute minimum price. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to sell the product to John for $10000. What do you think?
I've thought about it, and I'm willing to meet you at $9500, but that's my final offer. If I don't get it, I'll buy the product from John for $15000. I'm not willing to go any higher than this.
